ygData.subject: RE: Battle bard vs singing bard (was Does CHR affect Largos?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Umm, I think you meant Athren (some other guy) and not Anthem (me).  I said none of this stuff on this list and have done none of it, except the speaking
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]


> >
> > My statements were from my experience, not from Verant
> declaring the value
> > of charisma as you imply.

>
> Uh huh. Admiral Rokenn, you've got a new recruit.
>
> Ensign Anthem will now be assigned to your command.
>

Umm, I think you meant Athren (some other guy) and not Anthem (me). I said
none of this stuff on this list and have done none of it, except the
speaking with the devil thing.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 50 bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
